name: David Ramirez
text: I would write a Megamind/ Incredibles x-over that's playful and yet subversive in which Megamind becomes their Dr. Doom analogue, except people like him being in charge of Metrocity, and they engage in mock-battles for fun and training. Then an alien Beyonder/ Galactus type comes and misinterprets what's going on and tries to conquer earth for its own good.    Oh, uh. FF4? Step 1: take it out of Fox's hands and put it in Marvel Studio's hands.
